original_text: Adiel's son Azmaveth had authority over the places in the palace where the king stored his valuable things. Uzziah's son Jonathan had authority over the places in the different regions of Israel where the king stored his things. Those places were in towns, in villages and in strong towers. Adiel's son Azmaveth had authority over the places in the palace where the king stored his valuable things.
korean_text: 아디엘의 아들 아스마?은 왕의 곳간을 맡았고 웃시야의 아들 요나단은 밭과 성읍과 마을과 망대의 곳간을 맡았고

sentences.original_text: over the places in the palace
where the king stored his valuable things
over the places in the different regions of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘의 여러 지역에 있는 장소들에 대한

sentences.original_text: where the king stored his things
in villages and in strong towers
over the places in the palace
where the king stored his valuable things
